synopsis.text: After centuries of being dismissed as mere folklore, fairies are still a reality for a select few in the 19th century. Among them is Lydia Carlton, a 17-year-old residing in Scotland who has the rare ability to see and communicate with these mystical beings. Dubbed the Fairy Doctor, Lydia's peaceful life takes a dramatic turn when she encounters Edgar, the enigmatic Blue Knight Earl, who seeks her expertise in fairy lore. Edgar's quest for a legendary sword, a family heirloom that solidifies his claim as the rightful heir to the fairy kingdom, leads him to hire Lydia as his advisor. As they embark on this thrilling journey from Victorian England to the Fairy World, Lydia finds herself entangled in a web of secrets, emotions, and adventures that challenge her understanding of the mystical realm. Join Lydia and Edgar in this romantic fantasy as they uncover the truth behind Edgar's lineage and the legendary sword.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
